name: uHIT Softball
description:
Want to have better hitting vision? Start playing uHIT Softball today!

Originally built for MLB players, uHIT Softball takes the best of what’s worked for uHIT Baseball. But now it’s for fast-pitch!

Over a million pitches to improve your vision on. Hundreds of levels to pass as you learn to call balls and strikes better.

Need some practice on Drop Balls outer part of the plate?

Need some work on Rise Balls up and in?

uHIT Softball’s Train modules walk you step-by-step through the skills you need to succeed at the plate.

Want to get custom training programs? Use in-app purchases to reach the next level!

FREE to download, uHIT Softball gets you started with up to 50 pitches for simulated at-bats. Win more Innings as you improve your skills. And get more pitches in return! In-app purchases can help you keep training when you run out.

Check out the app preview images and videos to see how fun and easy it is to play uHIT Softball.

uHIT Softball features:

• Instant feedback on correct and incorrect calls
• Zone Recognition Training to work outer and inner zones, upper and lower zones
• Reaction Time Training to recognize fast pitches sooner
• Change Pitch Settings to play against lefty and righty pitchers
• Customize uHIT Softball to opposing pitchers and train your eyes in Zone Recognition Training

Visit https://decervo.com/uhitsoftball for more and if you need any help!
